page.title: 17LICHFIELD RAILWAY STATION
page.content: At the{Trent Valley Railway Station} there are two workers.One works from 6:30am to 2:30pm.The second works from 1:30pm to 9:30pm.All the trains are electric.There are two kinds of tickets-small slips of cardboard for longer journeys and small paper tickets for local journeys.Approx.35 tickets are sold daily and there are about 20 season ticket holders.There are 62 goods trains which pass through the station daily without stopping,and 49 passenger trains also pass through without stopping.The station has 3 trains daily direct to and from London. There are 13 trains that stop at the station on Saturday and 3 trains on Sunday. Although it is a main line,the station itself is not much used as so few trains stop there.
